title: Inquiry app for expert elicitation
text: app creating Inquiry templates, conducting survey, downloading results based shinysurveys package.

title: Inquiry app for expert elicitation
text: adding information help sites, docstrings vignette package, please update documentation locally follows. documentation main branch build automatically via github action.
code: devtools::document() # or CTRL + SHIFT + D in RStudio devtools::build_site()

title: Start Application — startApplication
code: startApplication(   port = getOption("shiny.port"),   launch.browser = getOption("shiny.launch.browser", interactive()) )

title: Start Application — startApplication
text: port port launch.browser true, system's default web browser launched

title: InquiryR 24.11.0
text: First version shiny app containing example inquiry template.
